DOC.brief_title: Metastases Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma Organ Transplant Recipients . The `` SCOPE-ITSCC Metastases Study ''
DOC.detailed_description: In large international multicenter prospective observational study total number 1000 OTR ( organ transplant recipient ) histologically proven cutaneous SCC ( squamous cell carcinoma ) include 10 center follow 2 year establish cumulative incidence metastasis OTR cutaneous SCC .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Organtransplant recipient ( OTR ) . Histologically proven cutaneous invasive SCC time inclusion Exclusion criterion : Lack consent . History metastases cutaneous SCC
